column4: thanks - pity, it releases the webcam now in aMSN but that's not much use if it's all grey :)
there are problems with kernel updates, don't upgrade. There is more info in the forums.
I cleaned out the old pwc modules and reinstalled the one I had working in 2.6.17.10 and it works fine now
good. Be sure to tell everyone not to update to the new kernel yet.
